1.0.name: wordpress/thecircle-daily-horoscope
1.0.description:
The Daily Horoscope widget from TheCircle offers the day's latest tips, opportunities and risks. The astrologers from TheCircle calculate these daily horoscopes for you using their wealth of experience and knowledge.

Choose your daily updated horoscope via your zodiac sign (Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, Pisces) to find out what the stars hold for you on this day.

This daily horoscope allows you to prepare for each new day!
